content: welcome to tkga s newest kal beginning january 17 2026 a study in contrasts is available for free to all knitters during our kal after 2/26/26 the pattern will be available in cast on magazine for tkga members only not a member yet you can join here https //tkga org/membership/ 1 enjoy the friendly supportive social aspect of knitting with others as we knit a seamless top-down pullover with options so you can create your own version choose from long or short sleeve cropped or standard length slip_stitch or mosaic colorwork now s the time to order your yarn gather your supplies cast on and get ready for our launch party with fiberchats on saturday january 17 2026 at 2pm et/11 am pt visit https //tkga org/kal/ 2 for zoom link coming in december 25 ready to join the kal first sign up for the kal this is the only way to obtain the special yarn discount from universal yarn https //tkga org/contests-events/kal/ 3 next download your free planner to help keep track of your design decisions and supplies connect with knitters - we ll be sharing wip photos and exchanging ideas in our tkga facebook group and would love for you to join us https //www facebook com/groups/425747943194136 4 we are a friendly kind group of knitters and all are welcome you do not need to be a member of tkga to join the kal ravelry thread is also open for discussion here https //www ravelry com/discuss/the-knitting-guild-association-tkga/4377396/1-25 5 **one of the most enjoyable aspects of designing knitwear is playing with contrasts whether it s colors stitch patterns and textures yarn textures or any combination of the three with this sweater duo i decided to play with contrasting colors as well as texture patterns i wanted to pair a painted yarn with a lighter solid color for the first pullover and with a darker solid color for the second pullover to see how the colors played together the long-sleeve standard-length pullover with the lighter solid color featuring a two-color slip-stitch pattern is bright and vibrant and the short-sleeve cropped pullover with the darker solid color worked in a mosaic stitch pattern is more subdued and restful ** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/the-knitting-guild-association-tkga/4377396/1-25 2 https //www ravelry com/discuss/the-knitting-guild-association-tkga/4377396/1-25 3 https //tkga org/contests-events/kal/ 4 https //www facebook com/groups/425747943194136 5 https //www ravelry com/discuss/the-knitting-guild-association-tkga/4377396/1-25
